Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Pretzel \Pret"zel\, n. [G. pretzel, bretzel. Cf. {Bretzel}.] A kind of German biscuit or cake in the form of a twisted ring, salted on the outside. [1913 Webster]
pretzel n : glazed and salted cracker typically in the shape of a loose knot
